page.title: 17Portsdown Park
page.content:
Portsdown Park is a large housing complex to the north of Portsmouth. It was built in the early 1970's to house people from demolished premises in the city.
Portsdown Park has three tower blocks as well as many smaller buildings and in constructed from brick and concrete. It was designed as the result of a competition but has suffered from many problems since it was built, such as dampness and vandalism. Many people wish it had not been built in the way it was. Portsdown Park stands on the slopes of Portsdown Hill and is a notable land mark, but some people think that it is an eye-sore.
